Posts.Content: Hi there,  I am having my treatment this way as well, I think they do it this way if you have a large lump/mass, mine was 10cm I've just been told I need 8 sessions of chemo though! Had meeting last Thursday I mine has reduced by 3cm after 2 FEC's Going for my 3rd on Wednesday and have been felt pretty good on the last 2. Hoping I feel ok after this one.  Good luck on your journey  Leigh x
Posts.Title: Neoadjuvent Chemo

Posts.Content: Hi Yes, I am either going on this trial or olympia. Just waiting on my blood results coming back from America and finishing RT  Xx
Posts.Title: Monarch has been suggested to me to go on the trial has anyone suffered...

Posts.Content: Hiya I was diagnosed the same as you last June. I done 8 cycles of chemo, mastectomy a radiotherapy. My onc put me back on chemo tablets for 6 cycles and I am half way through now. It’s been tough and when I look back I am not sure how I done it! But I have and now I can see the light at the end of the tunnel. Good luck With your treatment  Leigh xxx
Posts.Title: What is the prognosis for inflammatory breast cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you, first one done. Was over very quickly and not what I was expecting. 14 to go!  Good luck for Monday  Xxxx

Posts.Content: I got taken early too JollyG. I was back in the car by 9.10 this morning! Took me just under the hour to get there today! I am hoping the traffic isn’t as bad next week with the school holidays.  Hope your treatment was on time Caz Leigh  X
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Hiya I got told to use simple roll on deodorant and can use it on both arms. Got told not to shave! I can’t feek under my left arm anyway so wasn’t planning too!  I got a steroid cream that I’ve put on st teatime everyday and an emollient cream to use every night and morning from hospital. Skin a bit red but they said after 3rd zap skin looking ok. I managed to put mascara on my eyelashes today! Was so chuffed. Hope everyone is enjoying the 2 day break  Have a great weekend  Leigh x
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: Oh no- I can just imagine! I need to go into Edinburgh so will hit rush hour in the morning. I stay about 10 mikes outside Edinburgh but it will be nothing compared to London xxxx
Posts.Title: ☢☢☢ February 2018 Radiotherapy Club ☢☢☢

Posts.Content: I am hoping to work through RT as well. I can drive to hospital. Debbie - I am going on tamoxifen tablets after the chemo tablets (they are giving me these to help stop reoccurrence as mine was aggressive), I am also getting 4 weekly injections plus zoledronic acid every 6 months for 3 years! I am also going on a trial as well. Yip you think your getting to the end and then it’s all the other stuff to go  Leigh xxx
